meanings.definition: Provide captions or translations for a video or movie.
meanings.sent1: The kind librarian subtitled the foreign film for the students.
meanings.sent2: I always prefer watching subtitled movies to understand the dialogue better.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat subtitled the documentary with meowing sounds.
meanings.sent4: Her gestures subtitled her true feelings, even though she didn't say a word.
meanings.sent5: The subtitles subtitled the movie, making it accessible to a wider audience.

meanings.sent1: The subtitled version of the movie was perfect for the hearing-impaired audience.
meanings.sent2: I find it easier to follow the plot when watching a subtitled film.
meanings.sent3: The subtitled menu at the restaurant made me chuckle as it described each dish in detail.
meanings.sent4: His expression was like a subtitled book, revealing his emotions without words.
meanings.sent5: The subtitled text on the screen helped me understand the dialogue clearly.
